name: Came From Above
description:
You can operate an angelic machine which spreads chaos and fire to the ignorant muddy-kind, being helped by surgical strikes from above. You only have approx 3 minutes and 33 seconds for the legal retaliation! Show the might of technological upper hand to un-welcoming little friends.

Excluding quixel megascans assets, all the models are made by me within the period of this contest.

[Controls]

Movement : WASD

Attack : Left Mouse Click

Rain From Above(Orbital Strike) : Space Bar or Num 1
